name: Aderon: Scorched soul
description:
This is demo version Aderon: Scorched soul You can support us on Kickstarter

Aderon is a choice-driven, visual novel that blends cartoon styling with hardcore RPG elements. The full game will offer over 50 hours of content spread among the major branching routes and sub-routes.

The game will include three stages of the protagonist’s life. 

Depending on the decisions made, he will be either strong or agile or very smart. And he will also have to choose additional skills.

The influence of karma. The protagonist can be kind, can be evil. Very evil

Our game is not a dating sim. 

But we want to tell a beautiful love story and we believe visual novels are the good form of storytelling! 

Aderon is a game in which the life and death of the main character is in the player’s hands. If you make the wrong choice, the main character doesn’t lose the relationship points, he loses his life. And sometimes it won’t be a lot of time to make choise.

  • Nonlinear plot
  • Attributes and skills for choise
  • Impact of attributes and skills on dialogue and action
  • Love and romances
  • Health and stamina points
  • Quests
  • Grades of armor and weapons
  • Autosave progress (No rollback. Deal with it)
  • Ingame money
  • Karma points
  • Turn-based battles
  • Provisional release date: June 2021
  • The game will be available for Windows, Mac & Linux.
